trans-unit.source: Represents an open connection to a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma ligação aberta para um [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] base de dados.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When a new instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is created, the read/write properties are set to the following initial values unless they are specifically set using their associated keywords in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma nova instância do <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>criação, leitura/escrita propriedades forem definidas para os seguintes valores iniciais, exceto se especificamente definidos utilizando as respetivas palavras-chave associadas no <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>|empty string ("")| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>|15| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>|empty string ("")| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>|empty string ("")| You can change the value for these properties only by using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedades | Valor inicial | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>| uma cadeia vazia ("") | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>|&15; | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>| uma cadeia vazia ("") | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>| uma cadeia vazia ("") | Pode alterar o valor para estas propriedades utilizando apenas a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> class provides functionality for creating and managing the contents of connection strings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>classe fornece funcionalidades para criar e gerir o conteúdo das cadeias de ligação.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> class when given a string that contains the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> classe quando fornecida uma cadeia que contém a cadeia de ligação.

trans-unit.source: When a new instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is created, the read/write properties are set to the following initial values unless they are specifically set using their associated keywords in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma nova instância do <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>criação, leitura/escrita propriedades forem definidas para os seguintes valores iniciais, exceto se especificamente definidos utilizando as respetivas palavras-chave associadas no <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: |Properties|Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>|`connectionString`| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>|15| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>|empty string ("")| |<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>|empty string ("")| You can change the value for these properties only by using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedades | Valor inicial | |----------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>| `connectionString`| | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>|&15; | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>| uma cadeia vazia ("") | | <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>| uma cadeia vazia ("") | Pode alterar o valor para estas propriedades utilizando apenas a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> class provides functionality for creating and managing the contents of connection strings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>classe fornece funcionalidades para criar e gerir o conteúdo das cadeias de ligação.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: The connection used to open the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database.
trans-unit.target: A ligação utilizada para abrir o [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] base de dados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> class given a connection string, that does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref> and a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object that contains the user ID and password.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> classe fornecida uma cadeia de ligação, que não utiliza <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref> e um <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> objeto que contém o ID de utilizador e palavra-passe.

trans-unit.source: A connection string that does not use any of the following connection string keywords: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_UserId" name="UserId" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Password" name="Password" href=""></xref>; or that does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContextConnection = true" name="ContextConnection = true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de ligação que utiliza as palavras-chave da cadeia de ligação seguinte: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_UserId" name="UserId" href=""> </xref>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_Password" name="Password" href=""> </xref>; ou que não utilizam <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContextConnection = true" name="ContextConnection = true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: If `credential` is null, SqlConnection is functionally equivalent to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se `credential` é nulo, SqlConnection do é funcionalmente equivalente à <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the access token for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o token de acesso para a ligação.

trans-unit.source: The access token for the connection.
trans-unit.target: O token de acesso para a ligação.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma transação de base de dados.

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: Este comando mapeia para o [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementação de BEGIN TRANSACTION.

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tem de ser consolidar ou reverter a transação utilizando explicitamente a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para se certificar de que o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] fornecedor de dados para [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] modelo de gestão de transação efetua corretamente, evite utilizar outros modelos de gestão de transação, tal como a fornecida por [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se não especificar um nível de isolamento, é utilizado o nível de isolamento de predefinido.

trans-unit.source: To specify an isolation level with the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> method, use the overload that takes the `iso` parameter (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um nível de isolamento com o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>método, utilize a sobrecarga que recebe o `iso` parâmetro (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>).</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The isolation level set for a transaction persists after the transaction is completed and until the connection is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: O nível de isolamento definido para uma transação persiste após a conclusão da transação e até que a ligação é fechada ou eliminada.

trans-unit.source: Setting the isolation level to **Snapshot** in a database where the snapshot isolation level is not enabled does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Definir o isolamento para **instantâneo** numa base de dados em que o nível de isolamento do instantâneo não é ativado não acionar uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: The transaction will complete using the default isolation level.
trans-unit.target: A transação será concluída com o nível de isolamento de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If a transaction is started and a level 16 or higher error occurs on the server, the transaction will not be rolled back until the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Se uma transação for iniciada e um nível de 16 ou um erro superior ocorre no servidor, a transação será não ser revertida até o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>método é invocado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown on **ExecuteReader**.
trans-unit.target: Sem exceção é emitida **ExecuteReader**.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is thrown because [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Quando a consulta devolve uma grande quantidade de dados e as chamadas `BeginTransaction`, um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>é emitida porque [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] não permitem transações paralelas quando utilizar MARS.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar este problema, associe sempre uma transação com o comando, a ligação ou ambos antes de qualquer leitores estão abertos.

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transações, consulte "Transações explícitas" e "Codificação eficiente transações" na [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa a nova transação.

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).
trans-unit.target: Transações paralelas não são permitidas quando utilizar vários Active Directory resultado conjuntos (MARS).

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Transações paralelas não são suportadas.

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma transação de base de dados com o nível de isolamento especificado.

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: Este comando mapeia para o [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementação de BEGIN TRANSACTION.

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tem de ser consolidar ou reverter a transação utilizando explicitamente a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para se certificar de que o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] fornecedor de dados para [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] modelo de gestão de transação efetua corretamente, evite utilizar outros modelos de gestão de transação, tal como a fornecida por [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] default).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Depois de uma transação é consolidada ou revertida, o nível de isolamento da transação persistir para todos os comandos subsequentes que estejam no modo de Committed (o [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] predefinido).

trans-unit.source: This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode produzir resultados inesperados, tais como um nível de isolamento de REPEATABLE READ a persistência e bloquear a outros utilizadores fora de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=fullName> followed immediately by <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para repor o nível de isolamento para a predefinição (READ COMMITTED), execute o [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)] instrução definir transação isolamento nível READ COMMITTED ou chamada <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=fullName>seguido imediatamente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] isolation levels, see "Isolation Levels in the Database Engine" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] níveis de isolamento, consulte "Isolamento de níveis no motor base de dados" no [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transações, consulte "Transações explícitas" e "Codificação eficiente transações" na [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is thrown because [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Quando a consulta devolve uma grande quantidade de dados e as chamadas `BeginTransaction`, um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>é emitida porque [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] não permitem transações paralelas quando utilizar MARS.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar este problema, associe sempre uma transação com o comando, a ligação ou ambos antes de qualquer leitores estão abertos.

trans-unit.source: The isolation level under which the transaction should run.
trans-unit.target: O nível de isolamento em que deve executar a transação.

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa a nova transação.

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).
trans-unit.target: Transações paralelas não são permitidas quando utilizar vários Active Directory resultado conjuntos (MARS).

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Transações paralelas não são suportadas.

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction with the specified transaction name.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma transação de base de dados com o nome da transação especificada.

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: Este comando mapeia para o [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementação de BEGIN TRANSACTION.

trans-unit.source: The length of the `transactionName` parameter must not exceed 32 characters; otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento do `transactionName` parâmetro não pode exceder 32 carateres; caso contrário, será emitida uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The value in the `transactionName` parameter can be used in later calls to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> and in the `savePoint` parameter of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor no `transactionName` parâmetro pode ser utilizado em chamadas posteriores a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>e no `savePoint` parâmetro do <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tem de ser consolidar ou reverter a transação utilizando explicitamente a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>
